title: So I got punished for playing torturing someone as Teemo...

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I was playing teemo top support, was doing pretty great, 3/0 letting mf free farm while making their jayce rage in /all chat...


...when my laptop crashed.

Turned it back on and loaded up league, then it decided to scan files....? When I finally got into the game it gave me the message that said the connection was bad like the error button cancel thing is saying in the client. I pressed cancel like it said to and it loaded in the post game lobby and gave me a leave. I was waiting for the files to scan for like 13 mins.

So what happens? Why did it scan files when I got back on? {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Since your laptop crashed, there may be hardware issues, specifically disk issues since League had to scan for files and potentially repair them after you booted back up. Unfortunately, we cannot modify or remove any Leaverbuster penalties you may have received, but we can work together to troubleshoot this. I'd recommend working through our [**Bugsplat & Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to ensure your hardware is looking okay.

Let me know if you experience this issue again.
Thank you for responding, I'll see whats up with it
